text: Hadɨku 13.27 Mt 13.41 nudɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ abɨci ubalɨhavi uamalɨ. U kulaŋ iamɨgali nusaŋ nuken aba lɨbɨmɨŋɨci hɨnihɨdavi agɨladɨ vibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle uaiaŋ iakaiaka kɨlikɨli hen hɨnihɨdavi agɨladɨ vibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle uaiaŋ mɨgumɨgu kɨlikɨli hen hɨnihɨdavi agɨladɨ vibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle ium kɨlikɨli hen hɨnihɨdavi agɨladɨ vibalɨhavi uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle lakulamaŋ kɨlikɨli hen hɨnihɨdavi agɨladɨ vibalɨhavi uamalɨ.
